item.title: In Windows10, build personal website via Hugo-book and Github Actions
item.description: This is blog is about how to use Hugo to create the local website, and then deploy it on GitHub via Github Action. Everything is step by step. Prerequisites # Git Windows 10 VScode Install Hugo # In Windows10, right click Windows Powershell and click run as administrator. Refer to How to install chocolatey in Windows to install chocolatey. Refer to Install Hugo on Windows. to install Hugo by choco install hugo-extended Make sure Hugo works well by hugo version and we will get the following
